inclusion.criterion: Diarrhea associated with a positive stool test for C. difficile toxin(s)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: quote: The stool samples must were positive for Clostridium difficile toxin.

inclusion.criterion: Patient receives standard of care treatment for C. difficile associated disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Standard of care treatment includes metronidazole by mouth or intravenously or vancomycin by mouth
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient or legal representative has read, understood, and provided written informed consent and HIPAA authorization
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of chronic diarrheal illness such as ulcerative colitis or Crohn's disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Score of 4 on modified Horn's index
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe C. difficile colitis with planned surgery in less than 24 hours
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Positive pregnancy test within 24 hours of study infusion or an unwillingness to undergo pregnancy testing in females of child-bearing potential
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old woman admitted to the stroke department with recent history of aspiration pneumonia and febrile, tachycardic, and hypotensive. Stool samples positive for C. difficile toxin.
